titles.title: A joint resolution designating July 17, 1987, as "Langley Research Center Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/9/1987--Introduced. Designates July 17, 1987, as Langley Research Center Day to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the Langley Research Center of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
